summary: This release brings Grove's legal docs into the knowledge base with a handy table of contents and introduces a fun new ASCII art library for creative visuals. We've streamlined the admin experience with a refined sidebar, simplified Google-only sign-in, and completed our payment provider migration to Lemon Squeezy. Overall, it's a polish-focused update that makes the platform more cohesive and enjoyable to use, while laying important groundwork with extensive documentation and spec standardization.
